pr_title: Remove PlatformSpec unsupported parameters for now

timeline.message: Remove PlatformSpec unsupported parameters for now
add reference to PR to easy revert

timeline.bodyText:
nit: revert  https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/pull/2763 once advanced platform spec options are supported or once ${issue} is submitted?
Maybe we can move the TODO to the javadoc, since it pertains to the entire class.
timeline.author: mpeddada1

replies.bodyText: good call, will move to top of class, but since it's not really exposed documentation, I left it out of the javadoc.
replies.author: loosebazooka

revised_code.chunk: diff --git a/jib-cli/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/tools/jib/cli/buildfile/PlatformSpec.java b/jib-cli/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/tools/jib/cli/buildfile/PlatformSpec.java index 1ba7cdb83..0ce973a24 100644 --- a/jib-cli/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/tools/jib/cli/buildfile/PlatformSpec.java +++ b/jib-cli/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/tools/jib/cli/buildfile/PlatformSpec.java @@ -36,11 +36,11 @@ import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty; * - aes * } */ +// TODO: reintroduce platform details when ready +// TODO: revert https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/pull/2763 public class PlatformSpec { private final String architecture; private final String os; - // TODO: reintroduce platform details when ready - // TODO: revert https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/pull/2763 /** * Constructor for use by jackson to populate this object.
